title: URL Encode Function
description:
URL_ENCODE converts reserved characters in the string IN in the string

'%HH'. In a URL encoding only the characters [A.. Z, a.. Z found, 0 .9, -._~]

can occur. Other characters with a % sign followed by the two-character

hexadecimal code of the character are shown. The reserved character '#'

is encoded as a '%23'.
name: URL_ENCODE

input.name: STRING
input.description: The input string that contains reserved characters to be encoded.

output.name: STRING_LENGTH
output.description: The URL-encoded output string with reserved characters converted.

return_value.description: The URL-encoded string representing the input with reserved characters encoded.
